price: क्या मेरी आयतें तुमपर पढ़ी न जाती थीं, तो तुम उन्हें झुठलाया करते थे?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: alam takun āyātī tut'lā ʿalaykum fakuntum bihā tukadhibūna
